author: sussman
msg: Something we all agree on:  'svn st' no longer shows every entry by
default.  No more '-M' switch;  it's the default now.  Use '-v' to see
everything under version control.
(Note: the update functionality is still running under the hood,
but there's no switch to turn it on/off yet, and no code to display it
yet.)
* main.c (main): remove -M flag.  remove shortcut to --version, and
assign -v as shortcut to '--verbose' instead.
* cl.h (svn_cl__longopt_t):  add svn_cl__version_opt.
(svn_cl__opt_state_t):  add verbose flag.
* svn_wc.h, libsvn_wc/status.c (svn_wc_statuses): take `get_all' flag;
this libsvn_wc function should be optimized the same way as the svn
status flags; no reason to return hundreds of status-structures if
we're only going to print a few.
(assemble_status): conditionally allocate structs here now, take
`get_all' flag.
(add_status_structure): also take `get_all' flag, pass to previous.
* svn_client.h, libsvn_client/status.c (svn_client_status): add
`get_all' flag.
* status-cmd.c (svn_cl__status): pass '-v' flag instead of '-M' to
printer subroutine.
* cmdline/status.c, cl.h (svn_cl__print_status_list):  lose the flag arg,
this function no longer needs to "filter" structures.
* actions.py (run_and_verify_status):  always use '-v' flag, so our
python tests continue to get data!
* basic_tests.py (basic_revert):  fix copy-n-pasto from cmike.

author: kfogel
msg: Don't force the word "commit" into the subject line, let that be
decided by the caller.  Also, shorten "revision" to "rev".

author: kfogel
msg: (create_hooks): Fix path in example.

author: kfogel
msg: (create_hooks): Oops, fix escaping typo.

author: kfogel
msg: (create_hooks): Change example to reflect what we actually use on our
server, courtesy of Kevin Pilch-Bisson <kevin@pilch-bisson.net>.
Decided to do this inline after all, rather than invoke a separate
script, just to KISS.
